scripts.rmrf: rm -rf dist/super-forms/* && rm -rf docs && npm run rmuploads
scripts.copyfiles: cp -r src/* dist/super-forms/ && cp -r src/docs docs
scripts.renamelines: npm run delcode && npm run dellines && sed -i "s:Super Forms - Drag & Drop Form Builder:Super Forms - All In One Bundle:g" dist/super-forms-bundle/super-forms.php
scripts.dev: npm run copyfiles && npm run copybundle && npm run deladdons && npm run renamelines
scripts.prod: npm run rmrf && npm run copyfiles && npm run minifyjs && npm run minifycss && npm run copybundle && npm run deladdons && npm run renamelines
